title: Mentoring Programs for Online Lecture Development and Instructional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education experience and expertise in social studies
context.additional_context: Mid-sized group learning in offline classrooms using digital devices with continuous formative feedback

learning_goals: They can design one or more high-quality online lecture modules using technical tools and instructional design principles required for online course development.
Through collaborative mentoring with peer instructors, they can apply and evaluate three or more interaction strategies in online education.
They can develop two or more innovative teaching methods by integrating pedagogical approaches acquired from online education into existing offline classes.

resources: Online Lecture Authoring Tools (LMS, Video Editing Software)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
